turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I'd like to order pizza from Bella Luna's pizzeria, please. Can you help me out with that, please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i sure can. what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I get three pizzas all three of them medium with gluten free crust?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: One of them, can I get veggie lover pizza?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The second one, can I get a meat lovers pizza? Sorry about that.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: And the third one, can I get a barbecue chicken pizza, please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: no worries. i have you down for 3 medium pizzas, all with gluten free crust, 1 veggie lovers, 1 meat lovers, and 1 bbq chicken.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: $30.55 is the total. did you want me to place this order for pick up?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: lovely, i've placed the order. it'll be ready in 45 mins.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, that would be it thank you very much.
